SEARCH
Package pegasus.pointer

Interface LongPointer

All Superinterfaces:
BasePointer<Long>, IndexedLongIterable, Iterable<Long>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LongArrayPointer
public interface LongPointer extends BasePointer<Long>, IndexedLongIterable
A value-based primitive pointer of long values.
See Also:
  • BasePointer
  • LongArrayPointer

    • to

      static LongPointer to(long... values)
      Creates a new pointer referencing the provided array of values.
      Parameters:
      values - The values of which to reference
      Returns:
      The constructed pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided array is null

      Returns:
      The constructed pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided stream s is null

    • containsAll

      boolean containsAll(LongPointer p)
      Returns whether this pointer contains every value of the provided pointer p.
      Parameters:
      p - The pointer of which to check for containment
      Returns:
      true if this pointer contains every value of the provided pointer p
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided pointer p is null

      Returns the ith value of this pointer.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The ith value of this pointer
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - When the provided index i is out of bounds

    • firstIndexOf

      int firstIndexOf(long value)
      Returns the index of the first occurrence of the provided value. If no instances are found, this will return -1.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of which to query
      Returns:
      The first index of the provided value

    • lastIndexOf

      int lastIndexOf(long value)
      Returns the index of the last occurrence of the provided value. If no instances are found, this will return -1.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of which to query
      Returns:
      The last index of the provided value

    • indicesOf

      Set<Integer> indicesOf(long value)
      Returns a set containing every index of the provided value.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of which to query
      Returns:
      A set of every index of the provided value

    • fill

      void fill(long value)
      Fills this pointer with the provided value.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of which to fill this pointer with

    • fillRange

      void fillRange(int startIndex, int endIndex, LongPointer p) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Fills the specified range of this pointer with the provided values.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - The starting index at which to start filling values (inclusive)
      endIndex - The ending index at which to stop filling values (exclusive)
      p - The source pointer of which to retrieve values from
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - When the range is invalid, or is out of bounds
      NullPointerException - When the provided pointer is null

    • setAll

      void setAll(IntToLongFunction generator)
      Sets all values of this pointer using the provided generator function.
      Parameters:
      generator - The generator function of which to use to populate this pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided generator function is null

    • replace

      void replace(LongUnaryOperator operator)
      Applies the provided update function to each value of this pointer, then assigns each value to the return value of the provided update function.
      Parameters:
      operator - The update function of which to apply to each value of this pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided update function is null

    • replaceFirst

      void replaceFirst(long oldValue, long newValue)
      Replaces only the first instance of the old value to the new value.
      Parameters:
      oldValue - The old value of which to replace
      newValue - The new value of which to replace to

    • replaceLast

      void replaceLast(long oldValue, long newValue)
      Replaces only the last instance of the old value to the new value.
      Parameters:
      oldValue - The old value of which to replace
      newValue - The new value of which to replace to

    • replaceAll

      void replaceAll(long oldValue, long newValue)
      Replaces all instances of the old value to the new value.
      Parameters:
      oldValue - The old value of which to replace
      newValue - The new value of which to replace to

    • map

      LongPointer map(LongUnaryOperator mapper)
      Applies the provided mapper function to each value of this pointer, then returns a new pointer whose values are populated from that of the return values of the provided mapper function.
      Parameters:
      mapper - The mapper function of which to apply to each value of this pointer
      Returns:
      The resulting pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided mapper function is null

    • mapToObj

      <U> ObjectPointer<U> mapToObj(LongFunction<? extends U> mapper)
      Applies the provided mapper function to each value of this pointer, then returns a new pointer whose values are populated from that of the return values of the provided mapper function.
      Type Parameters:
      U - The type of object to map this pointer to
      Parameters:
      mapper - The mapper function of which to apply to each value of this pointer
      Returns:
      The resulting pointer
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided mapper function is null

    • merge

      LongPointer merge(LongPointer p, LongBinaryOperator merger) throws IncompatibleDimensionsException
      Applies the provided merger function to each corresponding pair of values between this pointer and the provided pointer p, then returns a new pointer whose values are populated from that of the return values of the provided merger function.
      Parameters:
      p - The pointer of which to merge this pointer with
      merger - The merger function of which to handle the merging of the two pointers
      Returns:
      The resulting pointer
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDimensionsException - When the pointers' sizes are different

    • resize

      LongPointer resize(int size)
      Returns a new pointer with of the provided size whose values are populated from that of this pointer's values, trimmed or padded with 0 values as necessary.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of which to resize to
      Returns:
      The resized pointer
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the provided size is negative

    • sort

      void sort()
      Sorts this pointer's values in their natural ascending order.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the pointer contains null values

    • sort

      void sort(LongComparator sorter)
      Sorts this pointer's values in accordance to the provided sorter function.
      Parameters:
      sorter - The sorter function of which to handle the sorting of the values
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided sorter function is null

    • reverse

      void reverse()
      Reverses the order of this pointer. For instance, the pointer ["hello", "world"] will become ["world", "hello"].

    • shuffle

      void shuffle()
      Shuffles this pointer's values in a randomized manner.

    • stream

      LongStream stream()
      Returns a stream whose source is the values of this pointer.
      Specified by:
      stream in interface BasePointer<Long>
      Returns:
      A stream of this pointer's values

      Extracts the internal array of this pointer, and returns a direct reference.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
